title: 111_s855
content: Establishes in the Treasury the Energy Assistance Fund. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury, upon request of the Secretary concerned, to transfer amounts from the Fund to that Secretary to make or guarantee low-interest loans or grants to US persons to purchase and install: (1) qualifying energy efficient property in their principal dwelling, (2) idling reduction devices or advanced insulation in heavy trucks. And (3) qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property at a station.
